articles.author: Tom Fish
articles.title: How long before Earth's core runs out of fuel? - Daily Express
articles.description: EARTH'S core is the hidden heart of our planet, now known to be key in sustaining life on our world. This has led scientists to question how much longer Earth's core will stay hot.
